hero_heading: Architecting Data Governance: From Google-Scale Integrity to Your Enterprise.
hero_subtext: Ensure end-to-end data lineage and robust risk mitigation. Leverage proven strategies from Google to safeguard your enterprise's data integrity and compliance.
blog_post_snippet: In light of recent data breaches and increasingly stringent compliance regulations, the need for robust data governance has never been more critical. At Google, I architected policy infrastructure, including the TRACE tool, to map data lineage and mitigate risks at scale. Now, I bring that experience to enterprises seeking to establish end-to-end data governance solutions, ensuring integrity and adherence to evolving compliance standards.
